channel.title: 562 safe zone
channel.description:
i was wondering because im kinda new to 562 coding. i can kinda code 525s. i noticed they are pretty similar but i was wondering how i can add safe pvp zones and nonsafe pvp zones to my server example: pur3zscsape 525 the bh crater is safezone pvp(items kept on death)- other places in wildy isnt...
and i want to make al-kharid the safe pvp zone where u keep everything but i cant see to find out how to and also the safezone in player.java, i got 2 of them :S can u help me? if u have skype msg me say u got it well thanks
-Jo-scape
